item.description:
Let's transport ourselves to a Bulgarian village square. World Music Stage presents "Voices of the Balkans" . The concert features the spectacular Tatiana Sarbinska, known as the Voice of Pirin and named National Treasure of Bulgaria, and her choruses Divi Zheni and Zornitsa. Instrumental features include virtuoso accordionist Koliu Kolev and Ralph Iverson with an American premiere of his Concerto for Gadulka.

Look at the Divi Zheni website for codes for online discount tickets at www.divizheni.net. Hear some of Tatiana's recordings at www.tatianasarbinska.com. See you there!
item.name: Bring out your inner Bulgarian
